RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 84. Starter Allowance Purse 17000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN THE LAST 5 STARTS. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 11 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,00 0 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOADED ONCE MORE chased the early pace, rallied two wide on the turn the make the lead entering the stretch, drew off under right handed urging past the furlong marker and was taken in hand late. AMAAZA away alertly, set the pace along the inside for a half then was no match for the winner. ERV'S WENCH slow early, found her best stride late outside. DUXONTHEPOND allowed to settle, passed tiring rivals four wide through deep stretch. NANA'S GRAY chased the pace along the inside into the turn then faded. OUT ATTHE SPEEDWAY went evenly. MISS OVER THERE stalked the early pace three wide, improved position on the turn, then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Nana's Gray
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Duxonthepond
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, passed tiring rivals 4 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Erv's Wench
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, best stride late outside

ENTRY.NAME: Loaded Once More
ENTRY.OWNER: Siesta Thoroughbred Racing Rossi Gregg and Toporcer Greg
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, rallied 2 wide, turn, drew off, in hand late

ENTRY.NAME: Out Atthe Speedway
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Over There
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, improved position turn, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Amaaza
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 1/4 pole, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Purse 27500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 11 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ATOMIC TONE broke in front, set all the pace and drew off under mild urging through the stretch to win in hand. COYOTE ROAD stalked the pace three wide, dug in late and got up for second. DOCTOR WU pressured the winner from the inside early, dropped back on the turn, came on again entering the stretch and was outfinished for second. FALCONS FURY pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then faded. ETHAN'S ANIMAL trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Ethan's Animal
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Doctor Wu
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, dropped back turn, came again, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Falcons Fury
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Coyote Road
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, dug in 3 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Atomic Tone
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set sharp pace, drew off, in hand late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 17600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 11. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HANSENATION sprinted up the inside to make the lead soon after the start, set all the pace, drifted out nearing the wire and last under brisk handling. BIG OHIO settled five wide early, closed willingly three wide through the stretch, steadied nearing the wire and the winner drifted out and was steadily gaining ground. HONOR THE D with the second flight three wide, offered a mild bid two wide nearing the top of the stretch, drifted out late and faded. BEST OF YOU close up from the start, inched closer along the rail into the stretch then leveled off. MONSTER HUNTER with the second flight two wide, failed to offer the needed response. CAPTAIN RILEY failed to menace. HEIDI'S SINATRA was in tight between rivals at the start then outrun. PLATE IT UP pressured the winner two wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Best of You
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move inside, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Hansenation
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, drifted out late, just lasted,

ENTRY.NAME: Heidi's Sinatra
ENTRY.OWNER: Eyerman, Lee J. and Molumby, John
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Monster Hunter
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Big Ohio
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 5 wide, closed willingly 3 wide, steadied near wire

ENTRY.NAME: Plate It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Riley
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Honor the D
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, 3 wide, middle move, 2 wide, drifted late, faded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 14900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PATIO PARTY was hustled to the lead soon after the start, set all the pace, was put to a right handed whip near mid stretch and drew off under strong handling to win as much the best. O CIGANO never far back, rallied three wide on the turn and finished well clear for second. TEMPLEMAN ALLEY passed tiring rivals three wide. LORD OF LEGENDS settled outside and failed to menace. JULIE'S FERRARI chased the winner two wide and weakened in the stretch. BLUEBANK was outrun. HEY SACH vied for the early lead inside rivals and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Patio Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, set pace, drew off, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Sach
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Julie's Ferrari
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2 wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Templeman Alley
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: O Cigano
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, middle move, 3 wide, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Bluebank
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Lord of Legends
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside, failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 15600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 11 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NICHOLAS JAMES prompted the pace along the rail into the turn, made the lead before a half, set the balance of the pace and drew off under mild right handed urging. CHROMED IMPULSE away alertly, set a pressured pace two wide for nearly a half then couldn't handle the winner while clear for second. GRAND DEAL unhurried early, passed tiring rivals outside through the stretch. GIANNIS stalked the pace four then three wide and lacked the needed response. SHIRLEY'S SHERMAN with the second flight, weakened inside. UNCLEJACKOMO broke slowly and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Nicholas James
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, took over 1/4 pole, drew off,

ENTRY.NAME: Chromed Impulse
ENTRY.OWNER: Siesta Thoroughbred Racing Rossi Gregg and Toporcer Greg
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace 2 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Shirley's Sherman
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, weakened inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Giannis
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4-3wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Unclejackomo
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, passed tiring rivals outside

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 101. Allowance Purse 31900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of $25,000 Since February 11 Allowed 3 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRST CITIZEN broke in front, set all the pace while nicely rated and won going away. JOHN'S ROCK tracked the winner along the inside for six furlongs, altered course to the six path then was no match while clear for second. COMPLY close up for five furlongs, dropped back to trail on the far turn then came on again along the inside. SOUND OFF failed to menace. HUNTER SCOTT moved up three wide before a half then came up empty. NIGHT TIME RULER pressured the winner two wide into the stretch then tired.

ENTRY.NAME: First Citizen
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, nicely rated, going away

ENTRY.NAME: John's Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, altered course 6path 1/4 pole, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Sound Off
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Night Time Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Comply
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, dropped back 2nd turn, came again inside

ENTRY.NAME: Hunter Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, empty,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Purse 40900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of $25,000 Since February 11 Allowed 3 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Highe st Earnings 2022-23 Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIVIS unhurried early, responded with a burst of speed along the rail under right handed urging through upper stretch, made the lead a sixteenth out and drew clear. WINE ME UP BABY away alertly, set the pace until deep stretch, drifted out to the four path under left handed urging the couldn't handle the winner. R THREE ANGELS stalked the pace and went evenly in the five path. A SMILE A DAY chased the winner along the inside into the stretch, drifted to the four path then faded. POWER BANKER stalked the pace two wide and was through after a half. DANCIN' ROSIE had brief speed. TOTALLY OBSESSED was no factor. CALI DREAM was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Cali Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Totally Obsessed
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: A Smile a Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Power Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Wine Me Up Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace late stretch, drifted 4path, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Dancin' Rosie
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Tivis
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, closed fast rail right urging, 1/16pole lead, clear

ENTRY.NAME: R Three Angels
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, evenly, 5path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 11 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAMBO KITTEN well placed, responded with a rapid move two wide on the far turn to make the lead near the five sixteenths marker, quickly opened a daylight lead set the balance of the pace and won under brisk handling. SAKONNA unhurried early, split horses two wide past the quarter pole, drifted out through the stretch and finished well clear for second in the seven path. DATTTSAFANCYFOX unhurried early, had a mild late rally in the five path path. ALSANAH passed tiring rivals inside. PACIFIC GROVE was no threat. QIA was no factor. IRON BERTIE rushed up the rail to lead briefly into the clubhouse turn, prompted the early pace, chased the leader into the far turn then gave way. FREE LOVE sped to the lead two wide on the first turn, opened a clear advantage before a half, set the pace into the far turn then was used up. AYY LADIES was never involved.

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Bertie
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, chased 2nd turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Free Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace 2nd turn, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Mambo Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rapid move 2nd turn, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Sakonna
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, split horses 1/4 pole, drifted, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Ayy Ladies
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Pacific Grove
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Datttsafancyfox
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, improved 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Qia
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Alsanah
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals inside,
